entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 12:53 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 97.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
